001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.extensions;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.allure.QueryResponseValidatorAllureImpl;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.annotations.DbHook;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.client.DbClientManager;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.connector.BaseDbConnectorService;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.hooks.DbHookFlow;
009import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.json.JsonPathExtractor;
010import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.service.DatabaseService;
011import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.exceptions.HookExecutionException;
012import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.hooks.HookExecution;
013import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.StoreKeys;
014import io.cyborgcode.utilities.reflections.ReflectionUtil;
015import java.util.Arrays;
016import java.util.Comparator;
017import java.util.HashMap;
018import java.util.Map;
019import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterAllCallback;
020import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeAllCallback;
021import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext;
022
023import static io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config.DbConfigHolder.getDbConfig;
024import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.util.PropertiesUtil.addSystemProperties;
025
026/**
027 * JUnit 5 extension that processes {@link DbHook} annotations on the test class.
028 *
029 * <p>Executes database-related hooks before and after all tests, ordered by the
030 * {@code order} attribute on the {@code @DbHook} annotation, and stores the hook
031 * parameters in the global ExtensionContext store under {@link StoreKeys#HOOKS_PARAMS}.
032 *
033 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
034 */
035public class DbHookExtension implements BeforeAllCallback, AfterAllCallback {
036
037   static {
038      synchronized (DbHookExtension.class) {
039         addSystemProperties();
040      }
041   }
042
043   /**
044    * Cached instance of {@link DatabaseService} used to execute hooks.
045    */
046   private DatabaseService databaseService;
047
048   /**
049    * Executes all {@link DbHook} annotations on the test class with {@link HookExecution#BEFORE}.
050    * Hooks are sorted by {@code order}, executed, and their parameters stored.
051    *
052    * @param context the JUnit extension context for the test class
053    * @throws Exception if any hook execution fails
054    */
055   @Override
056   public void beforeAll(final ExtensionContext context) throws Exception {
057      Map<Object, Object> hooksStorage = new HashMap<>();
058      DbHook[] dbHooks = context.getRequiredTestClass().getAnnotationsByType(DbHook.class);
059      Arrays.stream(dbHooks)
060            .filter(dbHook -> dbHook.when() == HookExecution.BEFORE)
061            .sorted(Comparator.comparingInt(DbHook::order))
062            .forEach(dbHook -> executeHook(dbHook, hooksStorage));
063      context.getStore(ExtensionContext.Namespace.GLOBAL).put(StoreKeys.HOOKS_PARAMS, hooksStorage);
064   }
065
066   /**
067    * Executes all {@link DbHook} annotations on the test class with {@link HookExecution#AFTER}.
068    * Hooks are sorted by {@code order}, executed, and their parameters stored.
069    *
070    * @param context the JUnit extension context for the test class
071    * @throws Exception if any hook execution fails
072    */
073   @Override
074   public void afterAll(final ExtensionContext context) throws Exception {
075      Map<Object, Object> hooksStorage = new HashMap<>();
076      DbHook[] dbHooks = context.getRequiredTestClass().getAnnotationsByType(DbHook.class);
077      Arrays.stream(dbHooks)
078            .filter(dbHook -> dbHook.when() == HookExecution.AFTER)
079            .sorted(Comparator.comparingInt(DbHook::order))
080            .forEach(dbHook -> executeHook(dbHook, hooksStorage));
081      context.getStore(ExtensionContext.Namespace.GLOBAL).put(StoreKeys.HOOKS_PARAMS, hooksStorage);
082   }
083
084   /**
085    * Resolves and executes a single {@link DbHook} by locating the corresponding {@link DbHookFlow}
086    * implementation and invoking its flow.
087    *
088    * @param dbHook       the annotation instance containing hook metadata
089    * @param storageHooks the map used to accumulate hook results and arguments
090    */
091   private void executeHook(DbHook dbHook, Map<Object, Object> storageHooks) {
092      try {
093         DbHookFlow<?> hookFlow = ReflectionUtil.findEnumImplementationsOfInterface(
094               DbHookFlow.class, dbHook.type(), getDbConfig().projectPackages());
095         hookFlow.flow().accept(dbService(), storageHooks, dbHook.arguments());
096      } catch (Exception e) {
097         throw new HookExecutionException("Error executing DbHook: " + dbHook.type(), e);
098      }
099   }
100
101   /**
102    * Lazily initializes and returns the singleton {@link DatabaseService}.
103    *
104    * <p>Configures JSON path extraction, a database connector manager, and an Allure result validator.
105    *
106    * @return the shared {@code DatabaseService} instance
107    */
108   private DatabaseService dbService() {
109      if (databaseService == null) {
110         JsonPathExtractor jsonPathExtractor = new JsonPathExtractor(new ObjectMapper());
111         databaseService =
112               new DatabaseService(jsonPathExtractor,
113                     new DbClientManager(new BaseDbConnectorService()),
114                     new QueryResponseValidatorAllureImpl(jsonPathExtractor));
115      }
116      return databaseService;
117   }
118
119}
